reviews.customers_say: Customers find the sweater well-made, soft, and comfortable, with a lovely pattern and true emerald green color.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cozy, soft & perfect for Fall!
items.body: I love this sweater so much I just ordered another today in eggshell! The berry red is the perfect fall color and the fit is perfect (I'm 5'5" and 145). I paired it with light khaki dress pants and received several compliments. The fabric is soft and the pattern is lovely. I wish there were more color and pattern options! Read more
items.author: D. Mcilvain

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Soooo soft!
items.body: The size is true to size. The material is so soft and great quality- seems durable. Not at all see-through. Fit is loose enough to be flattering, but not so loose it looks baggy. Perfect for dressing up for work or throwing on with jeans. Color exactly as pictured. Would recommend! I may order other colors! Read more
items.author: Katie

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Better than I expected
items.body: Was surprised at the decent quality of the item for the price. I had to get the largest size, as it doesn't come in Women's, only Misses, but I did like the look, the color, the feel, so I ordered another in a different color. Read more
items.author: Do It yourself

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars This is a very sweater
items.body: This is a nice sweater. It looks great and it feels good. It keeps me warm, but it doesn't get too hot (I wear long sleeves under it because I get cold easily). I wear a small, but I usually buy medium sweaters because I often wear an under layer and I don't like a snug fitting sweater. I'd say the size is a true fit. The sweater is nice for office/school casual, and it looks good with slacks/jeans/skirts, whatever you want to wear with it. Lately, sweaters are looking very cheap because the fabric is too thin, and because they aren't made to drape and flatter the figure (that's my opinion). This sweater is well made, it has a nice body, and the fabric has a proper density. It wears well. Read more
items.author: Karole

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars GOOD QUALITY, SOFT AND MEDIUM WEIGHT
items.body: Soft, made well, sized appropriately. Bright clean white color, very pleased. Read more
items.author: VICKI H.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great quality
items.body: Perfect emerald green color, good quality, soft, cozy and thick sweater. Read more
items.author: Bridget H

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars It’ll do
items.body: Slightly baggier than I’d prefer, even wanting a baggy sweater. It’s short in length and almost frumpy like. I’ll keep it but likely won’t wear it that often. It looks way better with dress slacks than jeans! Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars very lose fitting and comfortable
items.body: very nice sweater, Nice material Read more
items.author: Joyce Larraza

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.
about_this_item:

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: One Size.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Sky Blue, Taffy, Gray, White, Berry Red, Wormwood Green, Black, Eggshells, Green. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
